definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
Yellow River Cantata (1939) by Xian Xinghai 冼星海[Xian3 Xing1 hai3]

sentences.english: The performance was rounded off with group-singing.
sentences.chinese: 演出在合唱聲中圓滿結束。

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾爲香港科技大學學生會合唱團女高音聲部部長。

sentences.english: This song have got a lot of awards in hong kong.
sentences.chinese: 曾經攞過好多合唱歌曲獎既歌。

sentences.english: With the formal suits but humorous gestures, the Chorale made their first appearance.
sentences.chinese: 正式的着裝，詼諧的動作，是該合唱團的出場秀。

sentences.english: And we had competitions and choir and music every year.
sentences.chinese: 並且我們每年都會有比賽，合唱團和其他音樂節目。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three best children's chorales.
sentences.chinese: 科羅拉多童聲合唱團是世界最著名的三大合唱團之一。

sentences.english: Colorado Children's Chorale is one of the three best children's chorales.
sentences.chinese: 科羅拉多童聲合唱團是世界最著名的三大合唱團之一。

sentences.english: I was a member of the university singing club for two years.
sentences.chinese: 我曾兩年擔任學校合唱團的團員。

sentences.english: Please enjoy the big class two boys choir first song" happy holiday".
sentences.chinese: 請欣賞大二班童聲合唱第一支歌《快樂的節日》。

sentences.english: The cicada is stilled. The chorus of the cricket and katydid diminishes.
sentences.chinese: 秋蟬安靜下來，蟋蟀和蚱蜢的合唱聲減弱。

sentences.english: The next World Choir Games will be held in Cincinnati.
sentences.chinese: 下一屆世界合唱節將在美國辛辛那提市舉行。

sentences.english: The boy sings bass in the choir.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩在合唱團裏唱男低音。

sentences.english: Other voices, particularly in America, have joined the chorus of dismay.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在美國，其他的觀點也加入到反分心的合唱中。

sentences.english: After the clang or of organ majestic, or chorus, or perfect band.
sentences.chinese: 當莊嚴的風琴，或者合唱隊，或整個樂團，演奏完了。

sentences.english: That person leads the instrument ensemble of the chorus in the church.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的合唱表演是由那個人領奏。

sentences.english: I'm having a good day testing chorus pedals.
sentences.chinese: 我一整天都在測試合唱單塊呢，美好的一天。

definition: sung performance/to sing for an audience
vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
to be a dancing partner to sb/to perform as a backup dancer/taxi dancer (hired dancing partner)/escort
